books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.description: The first book in the Harry Potter series, introducing the magical world of Hogwarts.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel exploring the dangers of totalitarianism and surveillance.

books.author: Harper Lee
books.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.description: A classic novel addressing racial injustice in the American South during the 1930s.

books.author: Frank Herbert
books.name: Dune
books.description: Set on the desert planet Arrakis, Dune is the story of Paul Atreides—who would become known as Muad'Dib—and of a great family's ambition to bring to fruition humankind's most ancient and unattainable dream.
